      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected RecognitionCallback createRecognitionCallback()
      Use this method to create implementation of RecognitionCallback interface that will handle recognition done events.

      Returns the default direction that was requested via intent (with EXTRAS_STATUS_ORIENTATION extra)
      protected Pdf417MobiSettings getScanningSettings()
      Returns the scanning settings that were sent via intent with EXTRAS_SETTINGS extra.
      protected boolean isProgressBarEnabled()
      This is called inside onCreate when instatiating payment recognizer delegate.

      Called as last thing inside onPause.

      Called inside onResume method just before loading the camera

        Called inside onCreate method with extras that were provided via Intent. If you need to read some specific extras besides the default that are read in base use this method. Also you can set up cameraFactorySettings in this method.

        extras - extras from Intent

      • onCreateCameraManager

        protected final CameraManager onCreateCameraManager(CameraFactorySettings settings,
                                  AutofocusStatusView afsv)
        Description copied from class: BaseCameraActivity
        Called inside onCreate method. This method should build appropriate camera manager for camera preview.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        settings - camera factory settings as returned by onCreateCameraFactorySettings
        afsv - Interface for handling camera focus events.
        Returns:
        Appropriate camera manager.

      • onCreateViewFinder

        protected final IViewFinder onCreateViewFinder()
        Description copied from class: BaseCameraActivity
        Called inside onCreate method before building CameraPreview View. This method should build and return a class implementing IViewFinder interface that will handle various recognition events, such as detection position, and similar. If you return null, no overlay will be put on camera preview.
        Specified by:
        onCreateViewFinder in class BaseCameraActivity
        Returns:
        viewfinder implementation

        Returns:
        true if base activity should continue with loading, false if not (e.g. if start of another activity has been initiated)

      • requireAutofocusFeature

        protected final boolean requireAutofocusFeature()
        Description copied from class: BaseCameraActivity
        If autofocus feature is required, please return true from this method. If autofocus feature is not required, return false. If autofocus is required and device does not support autofocus, error will be raised and application will not start. If autofocus is not required, application will work even on devices without autofocus.
        Specified by:
        requireAutofocusFeature in class BaseCameraActivity
        Returns:
        True if autofocus is required, otherwise false.

      • onShouldLoadNativeRecognizer

        protected final boolean onShouldLoadNativeRecognizer()
        Description copied from class: BaseCameraActivity
        Called in onStart. If returned true, native recognizer will be loaded. Return false if you plan to immediately finish the activity to prevent unnecessary expensive loading of native library.
        Specified by:
        onShouldLoadNativeRecognizer in class BaseCameraActivity
        Returns:
        true if native recognizer will be loaded

      • isProgressBarEnabled

        protected final boolean isProgressBarEnabled()
        Description copied from class: BaseCameraActivity
        This is called inside onCreate when instatiating payment recognizer delegate. It must know whether or not it should report progress updates.
        Specified by:
        isProgressBarEnabled in class BaseCameraActivity
